# Tambourine

> Open-source AI voice dictation platform. Speak naturally, text appears at cursor.
> Multi-provider STT/LLM support, customizable prompts, cross-platform desktop app.

Tambourine is your personal voice interface for any app. Real-time speech-to-text
with AI-powered formattingâ€”removes filler words, adds punctuation, applies your
personal dictionary.

## Documentation

- [README](https://github.com/kstonekuan/tambourine-voice/blob/main/README.md): Setup, features, architecture, API reference
- [Contributing](https://github.com/kstonekuan/tambourine-voice/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md): Development setup, code quality, PR process
- [Full Documentation](./llms-full.txt): All docs compiled into one file

## Prompt Examples

- [Default Prompts](https://github.com/kstonekuan/tambourine-voice/tree/main/examples/default): Core formatting, backtrack corrections, dictionary
- [Immunology](https://github.com/kstonekuan/tambourine-voice/tree/main/examples/immunology): Medical terminology
- [Legal Contracts](https://github.com/kstonekuan/tambourine-voice/tree/main/examples/legal-contracts): Legal document formatting
- [Legal Transcription](https://github.com/kstonekuan/tambourine-voice/tree/main/examples/legal-transcription): Court transcription
